{"id":537623434,"lang":"javascript","lang_name":"JavaScript","time":"1 year, 10 months","timestamp":1628813999,"status":10,"status_display":"Accepted","runtime":"91 ms","url":"/submissions/detail/537623434/","is_pending":"Not Pending","title":"Max Area of Island","memory":"40.6 MB","code":"/**\n * @param {number[][]} grid\n * @return {number}\n */\nvar maxAreaOfIsland = function(grid) {\n    //traverse the grid\n    let max = 0, rows = grid.length, cols = grid[0].length\n    \n    if (rows === 0) return 0\n    \n    for (let i = 0; i < rows; i++) {\n        for (let j = 0; j < cols; j++) {\n            if (grid[i][j] === 1) {\n                //updating max: passing the grid so we can change the \n                //co-ordinates, i and j so we know the co-ordinates we \n                //are on when we find the island\n                max = Math.max(max, dfs(grid, i, j))\n            }\n        }\n    }\n    \n    return max\n};\n\nfunction dfs(grid, i, j) {\n    //Check if we are within bounds of the grid/matrix\n    if(i < 0 || i >= grid.length || j < 0 || j >= grid[i].length || grid[i][j] !== 1) return 0\n    \n    grid[i][j] = 2\n    let count = 1\n    \n    count += dfs(grid, i+1, j)\n    count += dfs(grid, i-1, j)\n    count += dfs(grid, i, j+1)\n    count += dfs(grid, i, j-1)\n    \n    return count\n    \n}","compare_result":"","title_slug":"max-area-of-island","has_notes":false}
